archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: DEAD: MS: Item
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Creation of basket entries according to data-driven product journey, abstracting business knowledge away from the consumer
Responsible for: generating a new basket item, ready to be included in the Basket microservice handling the generation of Form definitions to be passed to the API client handling validation of FormData objects passed by the API client controlling the navigation through pages required for product journey
The Item microservice relies on the Basket microservice to add the generated basket item to a basket.
